name: new
description: Creates a new directory and a new Angular app.

options.name: collection
options.description: Schematics collection to use.

options.name: verbose
options.description: Adds more details to output logging.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message. You can pass the format as a value.

options.name: dryRun
options.description: Run through without making any changes.

options.name: force
options.description: Forces overwriting of files.

options.name: interactive
options.description: Disables interactive inputs (i.e., prompts).

options.name: defaults
options.description: Disables interactive inputs (i.e., prompts) for options with a default.

options.name: inlineTemplate
options.description: Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

options.name: directory
options.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

options.name: experimentalIvy
options.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Specifies whether to create a new application which uses the Ivy rendering engine.

options.name: skipInstall
options.description: Skip installing dependency packages.

options.name: skipGit
options.description: Skip initializing a git repository.

options.name: commit
options.description: Initial repository commit information.

options.name: newProjectRoot
options.description: The path where new projects will be created.

options.name: inlineStyle
options.description: Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the workspace.

options.name: viewEncapsulation
options.description: Specifies the view encapsulation strategy.

options.name: routing
options.description: Generates a routing module.

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: Skip creating spec files.

options.name: createApplication
options.description: Flag to toggle creation of an application in the new workspace.

options.name: minimal
options.description: Create a barebones project without any testing frameworks
